definition: to change at once on seeing sth different (idiom); loving fads and novelty/never satisfied with what one has
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
different/other/hetero-/unusual/strange/surprising/to distinguish/to separate/to discriminate
to think/to consider
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: I am weary of your changing.
sentences.chinese: 我厌倦了你的见异思迁。

sentences.english: Blizzard is freakish , it is to acquire larger interest apparently.
sentences.chinese: 暴雪见异思迁，显然是为了获得更大的利益。

sentences.english: He is always changing his mind.
He is not a one-woman kinda man.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个见异思迁的人。

sentences.english: I don ' t think he can go far.
sentences.chinese: 他是个见异思迁的人，我认为他不会有什么出息。

sentences.english: He is a half-hearted man, i don't think he will be successed.
sentences.chinese: 他是个见异思迁的人，我想他不会有多大出息。

definition: lit. say three in the morning but four in the evening (idiom); to change sth that is already settled upon/indecisive/to blow hot and cold
in two minds about sth (idiom)/half-hearted/shilly-shallying
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
lit. to like the new, and hate the old (idiom); fig. enamored with new people (e.g. new girlfriend), bored with the old
serve Qin in the morning Chu in the evening (idiom); quick to switch sides
to cease to be faithful
fickle in love/sentimentality
(coll.) womanizer/skirt-chaser
fickle (woman)
to have a foot in both camps/to have a bet each way/to be having an affair
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/fig. to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
fickle (in love affairs)/dissipated/unfaithful/heart of a flower (pistil and stamen)
to fondle the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
see 腳踏兩隻船|脚踏两只船[jiao3 ta4 liang3 zhi1 chuan2]
